welcome_header: Welcome! How to set up the Excavator Alert
welcome_text:
🧩 Connect Telegram
• Send your admin your Telegram @username.
• The admin adds you under “Add recipient”.
• Open the bot (@LastWar_admin_bot) and press “Start”.
• As soon as “✅ paired” is shown, you will receive alerts.

🎮 In-game requirements (on the PC where this EXE runs)
• You are logged into the game.
• The ALLIANCE CHAT is visible at the bottom at all times.
• The bot only works if both the chat bar AND the excavator icon are visible (not covered).

⚠️ Popups
• Seasonal popups (city capture, blood night, …) may cover detection.
• Please close them – the bot continues right after.
• Off-season the bot keeps running as long as the game is up and the chat bar is visible.

ℹ️ Other
• Only resource nodes Lv. 1–10 are posted.
• Duplicate posts (same resource + level) are suppressed for 2 hours.
• A new excavator/drone is only posted 3s after the previous excavator icon disappeared.
• Every Monday 04:01 a weekly stats summary is posted to the group.
